summary:
"Damn i don't want to download all these textures again !
 There's so much chaos in all these UNP CBBE Better blah blah blah !"
Is that you ? Then this mod is for you !
descriptionHtml:
Wow ! | 472 Uniqe DL/s | 503 Total DL/s | 8,536 Total views | only per 4 hours !
[img]http://i232.photobucket.com/albums/ee187/Raestloz/Description.jpg[/img]
(Note: If you want same result like in image donwload this:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951 )
This mod imrpoves all female face,body,eyes & lashes textures.
It is just small help to you, like a headstart, if you dont want to
mess with finding all the textures i made a repack for you =) ( w/ permission ! )
[img]http://i232.photobucket.com/albums/ee187/Raestloz/installation.jpg[/img]
-1 Open the file called "Import Files Inside - Data"
-2 Select all the files and drop them into your Data File inside the Skyrim File
-2.1 Commonly found in:
Steam        : steamapi-common-skyrim-Data
Non-Steam : installationfile-skyrim-Data
-3 When asked to owerwrite select "yes"
-4 Activate The InstaBeauty_v**.esp in the Skyrim Launcher
-5 Done ! Everything mentioned in ReadMe (Very short ReadMe) is in your game ^_^ 
[img]http://i232.photobucket.com/albums/ee187/Raestloz/thanks.jpg[/img]
Dimon99 for awesome UNP body
zzjay for beautifull face textures
humannature66 for extra long lashes
tktk1 for Enhanced Character Edit
BellaGail for better females
Xenius for XCE
nuska for High Res Normal Maps
Navetsea
Neckros
Everyone who will support this mod 
Everyone who will upload images of their beautifull characters 
And many others...
[img]http://i232.photobucket.com/albums/ee187/Raestloz/QA.jpg[/img]
Q: Why there aren't mods like in the picture ? 
A: Cause authors didn't gave me permissions.
(Download's here)
Apachii Sky Hair (Hair) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168//?
Hairs Trought Headgear - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36517/?
Feather hair accesories - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38728/?
Hood - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27054/?

Q: Why the oiled body has bikinis ?
A: Did you installed the Blessed UNP Body ?

Q: Omg what is the background in the image ? What location mod is that ? Plz tell me
A: Dawnguard DLC...
author: Lena Shadow
